articles.author: Tom Parfitt
articles.title: Belarus foreign minister Vladimir Makei dies on eve of meeting Russia's Sergey Lavrov - The Times
articles.description: The long-serving foreign minister of Belarus, Europe’s last dictatorship, has died unexpectedly, shortly before he was due to meet his Russian counterpart.The
articles.content:
The long-serving foreign minister of Belarus, Europes last dictatorship, has died unexpectedly, shortly before he was due to meet his Russian counterpart.
